about_the_game:
Awakening in heaven, its sanctity and splendor remain, yet there are no paths upwards—only stairs leading down. As the descent continues, more and more things appear that do not belong here. Check the blood-stained Bible and take up the shining cross, for ahead lies the mark of the demonic god.

Gameplay:

Descend into a world where heaven is marred by an unsettling invasion. Equip the shining cross to fend off demonic entities and explore the realms below.

Atmosphere:

Immerse yourself in a strikingly detailed environment that blends the ethereal with the corrupted. The haunting soundtrack underscores your journey, enhancing every step.

Puzzles & Challenges:

Face intricate puzzles and straightforward challenges as you navigate through the levels. Each challenge you conquer brings you closer to unraveling the mysteries that lie ahead.

Prepare yourself for a journey that melds the divine with the diabolical. Dive deep into this ethereal yet corrupted realm and emerge victorious, with the shining cross as your beacon of hope.

This game is created by @冷宸谦 with YAHAHA Horror Game Kit and YAHAHA assists the creator with packaging and publishing the game based on their request. Yahaha Horror Gamekit is tailored for imaginative creators and players who adore horror games, all without the need for any programming expertise.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.

name: Path to Heaven

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window 10 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: When heaven is tainted by evil, where shall we find redemption? Or, is this a path to heaven, or a road to hell?
